sqlMap.select:
select t1.branchcode, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname, t1.deptcode, (select deptname from ba_deptmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode and deptcode = t1.deptcode) as deptname, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '004' and dcode = t1.duty) as duty, t1.insacode, t1.kname, t1.joindate, t1.retiredate from hr_insamst t1 where 1=1
and t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
and t1.kname like '%$S_KNAME$%'
and t1.retiredate is null

select t1.branchcode, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as o_branchname, t1.joindate as o_joindate, t1.retiredate as o_retiredate, (case t1.employgubun when 'R' then '정규' when 'F' then '프리' end) as o_employgubun from hr_insamst t1 where 1=1
and t1.insacode = #INSACODE#
and t1.retiredate is not null order by t1.joindate asc

select concat(t1.a, '01') M1_FR, concat(t1.a, '31') M1_TO, concat(t1.b, '01') M2_FR, concat(t1.b, '31') M2_TO, concat(t1.c, '01') M3_FR, concat(t1.c, '31') M3_TO, concat(t1.d, '01') M4_FR, concat(t1.d, '31') M4_TO, concat(t1.e, '01') M5_FR, concat(t1.e, '31') M5_TO, concat(t1.f, '01') M6_FR, concat(t1.f, '31') M6_TO from ( select (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -1 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as a, (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -2 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as b, (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -3 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as c, (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -4 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as d, (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -5 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as e, (select substr(replace(( cast(date_add(#S_SALEDATE_FR#, interval -6 month) as char)),'-', ''),1, 6) from dual) as f from dual )t1

select (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT6 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M6_FR# and #M6_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT6, (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT5 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M5_FR# and #M5_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT5, (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT4 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M4_FR# and #M4_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT4, (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT3 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M3_FR# and #M3_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT3, (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT2 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M2_FR# and #M2_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT2, (select sum(t2.sellamt) AMT1 from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #M1_FR# and #M1_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as AMT1, (select sum(t2.sellamt) TOTAMT from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and saledate between #S_SALEDATE_FR# and #S_SALEDATE_TO# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid) as TOTAMT from dual
